entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Freezing rain over southern sections near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
